name: soil_params.expon
description: optional; defaults to 1.0

name: soil_params.expon_secondary
description: optional; defaults to 1.0

name: forcing_file
description: path to forcing inputs csv; set to BMI if passed via bmi.set_value()

name: num_timesteps
description: set to 1 if forcing_file=BMI

name: verbosity
description: prints various debug and bmi info

name: surface_runoff_scheme
description: also supports 1 for GIUH and 2 for NASH_CASCADE; default is GIUH

name: N_nash_surface
description: number of Nash reservoirs for surface runoff

name: K_nash_surface
description: Nash Config param for surface runoff

name: nash_storage_surface
description: Nash Config param; reservoir surface storage; default is zero storage

name: nsubsteps_nash_surface
description: optional (default = 10); number of subtimstep for Nash runoff

name: Kinf_nash_surface
description: optional (default = 0.05); storage fraction per hour that moves from reservoirs to soil

name: retention_depth_nash_surface
description: optional (default = 0.001); water retention depth threshold (only applied to the first reservoir)

name: max_rootzone_layer
description: layer of the soil that is the maximum root zone depth. That is, the depth of the layer where the AET is drawn from

name: soil_layer_depths
description: an array of depths from the surface. Example, soil_layer_depths=0.1,0.4,1.0,2.0

name: soil_params.depth
description: soil depth

name: soil_params.b
description: beta exponent on Clapp-Hornberger (1978) soil water relations

name: is_aet_rootzone
description: when CFE coupled to SoilMoistureProfile

name: is_sft_coupled
description: when CFE coupled to SoilFreezeThaw

name: soil_params.satdk
description: saturated hydraulic conductivity

name: soil_params.satpsi
description: saturated capillary head

name: soil_params.slop
description: this factor (0-1) modifies the gradient of the hydraulic head at the soil bottom.  0=no-flow.

name: soil_params.smcmax
description: saturated soil moisture content

name: soil_params.wltsmc
description: wilting point soil moisture content

name: max_gw_storage
description: maximum storage in the conceptual reservoir

name: Cgw
description: the primary outlet coefficient

name: expon
description: exponent parameter (1.0 for linear reservoir)

name: gw_storage
description: initial condition for groundwater reservoir - it is the ground water as a decimal fraction of the maximum groundwater storage (max_gw_storage) for the initial timestep

name: alpha_fc
description: field capacity

name: soil_storage
description: initial condition for soil reservoir - it is the water in the soil as a decimal fraction of maximum soil water storage (smcmax x depth) for the initial timestep

name: K_lf
description: Nash Config param - primary reservoir

name: N_nash
description: number of Nash lf reservoirs (optional, defaults to 2, ignored if storage values present)

name: K_nash
description: Nash Config param for lateral subsurface runoff

name: nash_storage
description: Nash Config param - secondary reservoir

name: soil_params.mult
description: multiplier

name: giuh_ordinates
description: Giuh ordinates in dt time steps
